data.title: 87ELEVEN ACTION DESIGN
data.meta_description: 87eleven Action Design provides stunt equipment packages, facilities rentals, and personalized stunt training for studio action films around the world.
data.text:
Big action films demand real action stunts. At 87eleven, we supply the industry-leading equipment, facilities, and training that enable filmmakers to realize their creative visions and bring action stunts to life onscreen in mind-blowing ways. With over 20 years of stunt-industry experience, our team delivers a comprehensive approach to action design — using our diverse knowledge and skills, we help create innovative and safe, yet one-of-a-kind stunts that are worthy of today’s biggest action films.

KICKIN' IT ON THE BIG SCREEN

Our credits for action design include several of Hollywood’s biggest films. But whether the project is a film short for the festival circuit or a summer blockbuster with a multi-million-dollar studio budget, 87eleven provides the specialized equipment, fully equipped facilities, and personalized training needed to perform the desired stunts. With more than two decades of stunt-industry experience, our team has the knowledge and skills to accomplish stunts on-budget while keeping the cast members safe and fulfilling the filmmakers’ creative visions.
